Title: Shortens time frames during which an insurer has to determine whether a pre-authorization request is medically necessary
Summary: Shortens time frames during which an insurer has to determine whether a pre-authorization request is medically necessary from three business days to three days.
LawCode: Amd ยง4903, Ins L; amd ยง4903, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to shortening time frames during which an insurer has to determine whether a pre-authorization request is medically necessary
